articles.title: Marathon man Djokovic beats Musetti in latest-ever finish at French Open - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Defending champion wins a four-and-half-hour epic to keep alive his hopes of winning a 25th Grand Slam title.
articles.content: Novak Djokovics bid for a 25th Grand Slam briefly hung by a thread on a cold and damp night at Roland Garros but the Serbian battled back for a 7-5, 6-7(6), 2-6, 6-3, 6-0 win over Lorenzo Musetti in … [+3715 chars]

articles.title: Prostate cancer hopes raised after at-home spit test trials - BBC.com
articles.description: Research suggests cheap and simple spit tests may be better at catching the disease than blood tests.
articles.content:
Saliva tests carried out at home are better at identifying men who are at higher risk of prostate cancer than the standard blood test, new research suggests.
